title: Chinese chicken in black bean sauce
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons toasted sesame oil', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '4 garlic cloves', '6 tablespoons black bean sauce', '400g chicken breast, chopped into cubes', '1 chicken stock cube', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 bunch spring onions, chopped', '2 green peppers, chopped', '1 1/2 tablespoons dark soy sauce', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '4 teaspoons cornflour']
